What's BitMart?

BitMart is a globally recognized cryptocurrency exchange known for its wide range of digital assets and trading options. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned trader, BitMart offers an intuitive platform, high liquidity, and advanced features to support efficient and secure trading experiences.

  • Diverse crypto assets and trading pairs
  • Low fees and high performance
  • Enterprise-grade security infrastructure
  • Easy-to-navigate interface for all users

API Key Setup Process

Follow the steps below to create and configure your API keys for BitMart.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials.' %}

1 Create a BitMart Account

If you donâ€™t already have a BitMart account, please sign up here.

2 Go to API Management

  1. Log in to your BitMart account.
  2. Click on your profile icon at the top-right corner and select API Management.

3 Create an API Key

  1. Click Create API.
  2. Enter a memo for your API key (Make sure to remember the memo because you will need it).
  3. Set the necessery permissions (Spot Trade, Future Trade).

4 Set IP Whitelist and Confirm

  1. Paste our server's IP address in the IP whitelist field: {{ server_ip }}.
  2. Complete any security verification required (e.g., 2FA, email code).
  3. Once done, click Confirm to get your API credentials.

Complete the Connection

Copy your API Key and Secret, then paste them into the integration form in your IsAlgo automate dashboard. Ensure you keep your credentials safe and never share them.
